A ideia do jogo é muito boa, mas só dá pra se divertir emuma a cada 3 partidas em média (sério)
Problemas do jogo
- Tem sérios problemas de conexão. A desenvolvedora BHVR não dá suporte adequado e você pode acabar perdendo facilemtne várias horas de jogo no mês devido a erros de conexão. Falo por experiência própria
- Skins caríssimas (chegando ao ridículo de custar >R$20) 
e 
- PRINCIPALMENTE tem a pior comunidade de jogares que eu já vi. Dúvido que haja um jogo que tenha mais chances de tirar uma pessoa do sério do que esse
- É útil se você quer saber até onde vai a sua paciência

Fora isso o jogo é completamente viciante, envolve raciocínio rápido e faz com que você tenha que se pôr a todo instante no lugar do adversário para escolher o próximo passo.

So, I love this game. I dumped almost 400 hours into this game. I had a big break in the meantime but I recently picked it up again and it has only gotten better.

But let me tell you one thing first: This game has a STEEP learning curve. Really steep. Some killers can be downright useless if you don't know how to use them, like the hag or the nurse, but once you know what to do with them, it becomes so much more fun. Same with survivors. You'll get your ass torn apart by decent killers. But once you pick up on how to play the game, it will become so much more fun. This is not a game you play one hour per week and have loads of fun. This is a game where you dump lots of hours into and once you become somewhat good, you'll get addicted.

Now, yes, this game has problems. It's map design on some maps is downright frustrating for either the killer or the survivors. However, the newer maps turned out quite nice and are actually fun. But the devs are constantly (but slowly) work on the game, buffing, nerfing, reworking and rebalancing the game, also, they are adding new content in the form of DLCs which are actually fairly priced if you ask me. ~7€ per DLC is totally fine if you play the game a lot given that the game itself isn't that expensive.

Overall, if you enjoy the asymmetrical horror or have a few friends to play with, this game is great. You can dump countless hours into this game, way more than I did. Also, this game offers a lot to unlock, so you're constantly progressing your characters. 

I can only give this game a thumbs up because I only see a few flaws. The mentioned maps are a problem, certain perks are outright useless while others are completely busted, but as i said, the devs are constantly working on it.

DBD é um jogo divertido, bonito, ambientação muito bem feita e de mecânica incrivel, porém o jogo é mais facil para os killers do que para survivors, os killers pontuam muito facilmente, tem suas hitbox bugadas, principalmente hillbilly,hag,huntress, além dos noobs que não sabem jogar e fazem facecamping, já os sobreviventes tem que fazer gerador, salvar sobreviventes, abrir baus para conseguir pontuar (pip), coisa que vai ser quase impossivel de fazer quando o killer fizer facecamping, a empresa tem tentado melhorar essa 'estrategia' mas até o presente momento sem sucesso, espero que eles consigam balancear e arruma uma maneira justa de tirar o facecamping do jogo.

[h1] A massive failure of a company, filled with technical errors, bugs, and development mistakes. [/h1]

[b] The State of Dead by Daylight [/b]
Dead by Daylight was a tool that broke the mold in terms of creating an asymmetrical horror game with a simple 4v1 gamemode. Many many years later, the game is a compilation of errors that players face.

BHVR Interactive was often titled "successful" each time they published a major content launch for Dead by Daylight with many articles just avoiding anything related to the deeper game mechanics. After 1200+ hours of gameplay experience, I can clearly make the statement below:
[u] Do not buy this game. [/u]

Dead by Daylight holds two major gamemodes and one additional game mode that allows you to have custom matches with your friends. The other two major gamemodes are Survivor and, as expected, Killer. Both sides have a variety of characters. Survivor characters remain as "skins" with different sounds as you buy their perks at specific levels which make it possible for other survivor characters to have them. Killers have the similar attribute, but the fact that each killer has their own ability impressively adds originality.

[h1] Is it Fun? [/h1]
The game cannot be defined clearly as "fun" or "boring" entirely since all of the matches depend on either side's work, gameplay, and experience as well. It is a possibility that you will be put into a lobby as a Rank 1 Killer / Survivor while other players are Rank 7s, 14s, or even 20s. [b] Matchmaking is a complese mess. [/b]

Progression in the game requires you to grind a lot, but then again, it is the only replayability of the game. Unless you have a chain of terrible events filled with players that simply kill your fun, it is very likely you will have another round of game until you have that one terrible game.

[h1] What about your statement at the beginning? [/h1]
Dead by Daylight is going to celebrate its 4th anniversary soon. That is an impressively long development span. However the game is filled with technical errors and bugs that effectively prevent you from progressing in the game. And what happens when the only way of replayablity gets harmed? You have nothing but a broken product in your hands. 

[u] Being able to add more and more content to the game while letting a broken game remain is utterly disrespectful for the entire community. [/u] Do not buy this game by any means and do not support it till the company pushes their effort to the maximum to fix some gamebreaking issues lasting for at least a year.

Although this game has it's bugs and a few connection issues. This game is great. I have had a great time playing with friends. I play killer when I play by myself and it is loads of fun. If you are on the brink of deciding whether or not to get it, just get the game. It is lots of fun.

솔직히 가격이 아까운 게임은 아니다. 다만, 내용물은 어디까지나 인디게임일 뿐이다.

졸라게 모으기 힘든 블포와 레벨이 뉴비들에겐 1차적 진입 장벽으로 다가 올 것이며,

랭크 시스템도 솔직히 제대로 잡혀 있다고 보기도 힘드며 보상도 없어서 개판이다.

다른것 보다도 문제는 매칭을 개떡같이 500핑 까지도 잡아주는데, 솔직히 200핑 넘어가면 누가 게임하냐? 제발 좀 100대까지만 잡아줘라. 어차피 그 이상은 방 나갈건데 왜 잡아주는지;

그래도 가격값을 못하는 게임은 아니다. 재미는 있다.

İlk birkaç saat oyunu keşfederken keyif alabilirsiniz, ancak yapısı itibariyle sürekli aynı şeyleri yaptığınız monoton bir oyun. Grafikleri iyi, ancak oyun sıkıcı ve verdiğiniz paraya değmez.

【ゲーム性】
昔からある鬼ごっこがベースなので依存するほど面白い訳ではないが飽きが来ることはあまり無いとは思う。
【問題点・マナー】
少数のプレイヤー達のマナーが非常に悪い（屈伸煽り、チャット煽り、粘着、残業）あまり気にせず笑って済ませるしかないが、楽しくプレイできる環境ではない。また各ランク帯に存在している為、やり込めば遭遇しなくなる訳でもない。
【問題点・バランス】
ソロプレイヤー同士ならば鬼側が有利、バランスは悪い
パーティプレイヤーのマッチング規制が無いため、鬼側がチェックをし、対応しなければならない。
PTは圧倒的に有利なので結果はどうであれ、楽しめないことが多い
【オススメできない点】
悪質なプレイヤーが多い（チーターや粘着）
3試合に1回マナーの悪いプレイヤーに遭遇する
全キャラ楽しく使えるほどバランスは良くない
PTプレイヤーのマナーが特に悪い
一部のアイテムを使うだけで荒れる
切断(ルーム退出含む）が非常に多い

以上の事から一気に冷めることがある、不快な思いをしたくないのであればオススメは出来ません。
gioco lezzo

La verdad que después de varias horas de juego he formado una opinión bastante solida respecto a este. El concepto es simple e interesante: cuatro supervivientes tratan de huir del asesino, encendiendo los generadores y abriendo la puerta de salida. En medio de todo eso se van ayudando uno al otro, y no se dejan de agarrar por el cazador, el objetivo del cual es, justamente, asesinar a todas las personas, de esta manera saliendo victorioso. La manera de juego la determina cada persona por su propia cuenta: ayudar lo máximo posible a tus compañeros, y ser la "carnada", dándole tiempo a los demás a activar los generadores, o ser un completo cobarde y dejar morir a tus compañeros, mientras escapas del lugar. 
Ademas de todo esto, los jugadores, tanto los supervivientes, como los asesinos, tienen como una rama de habilidades, que van subiendo a medida que van jugando y ganando sangre, o como sea que se llama el recurso principal. Debido a que solo puede ser gastado en eso, es mas apropiado decirle experiencia, mas que otra cosa.

Jugar de superviviente, por mi, es mucho mas interesante y divertido, que de asesino. La adrenalina y diversión que uno recibe al lograr de huir/baitear al asesino es indescriptible, hay que experimentarlo por su propia cuenta. Ademas, como uno desde entrada no sabe que asesino exactamente le tocara, trae mucha diversidad al gameplay, ya que cada enemigo tiene su propio estilo de juego, y atrae con eso ciertas tácticas y cuidados que hay que tener a la hora de escapar/baitearlo. Pero todos esos hechos no impiden que jugar de asesino no es divertido, simplemente son otros sentimientos y emociones, ya que al jugar de asesino uno busca asustar a sus victimas, cazarlas. Ademas, el asesino ve todo de primera persona, lo que complica bastante su estilo de juego.

En fin, un buen juego, que estoy listo a recomendar a cualquiera que busca divertirse por un largo rato, ya sea solo o con sus amigos."

La verdad, no haría esta reseña si no tuviera algo de experiencía en DbD.

Por ejemplo, la build de la Cazadora (hyper mega cheta) que te ownea con un dedal, esa build impide a los jugadores jugar en paz, ya que si te toca una Cazadora "camper" que no se menea ni para atras, con Insidioso que no la puedes ni ver si se esta quieta, es ya GG EZ.

Sí, esta muy bien que haya builds así que te limiten el número de dedales para lanzar ... pero es que esta te limita en 4 (de 5 que tienes) y si te pones el cinturon recupera el que te quitan, y tienes 6 ... ¿Os parece justo esas builds de noobs? Me gustaría que los desarrolladores revisaran todos los objetos, miraran cada uno de ellos y probasen diferentes builds, porque da asco que una Cazadora te campee con esa build de mierda ¿Esquivas los 6 dedales? Tranquilo, que se va a una taquilla y ya tiene otros 6 para lanzarte y reventarte.

¿Recomiendo el juego? Para los amantes del terror, sí, es un buen juego en el que te echas unas buenas risas. Salvo por algunos asesinos que tienen ataques kilometricos y te ownean con un dedal (rollo cazadora), esta bastante bien. Si tengo que poner notas, donde más fracasaría este juego es en el nivel de Asesino - Jugador y en la optimización de algunos mapas.

Eso sí, si juegas como killer (y por mucho que se haya aclarado que se puede campear y esta permitido), olvidate de intentar campear a no ser que quieras que la comunidad "mayormente" tóxica de esta comunidad te insulte por el chat, por hacer una práctica que a la vez es ruin, pero esta aprobado por los desarrolladores.

Get the game if you wanna play with friends, or play as the killer... otherwise you are fucked, the game is so unbalanced with survivors being no where NEAR as effiecient as the killer. He will always trump your speed, luck, Hit box, EVERYTHING. even when you are caught and have to wiggle out, you cant because the fucking hooks are only 5 feet apart and the wiggle out time is MASSIVE. If the killer knows where you are, you wont survive if the killer is even remotely decent (or has played video games at least once). He can outrun you in every situation and you can not fight back.
also, playing as a survivor against any dlc killers is pointless because you CANT survive, because their abilities are literally Overpowered, some can see you through walls at all times, hit you from 30ft away, and even electrocute you when you arent even remotely near the killer.
(which gives away your position.
i love this game and i think its great, but dont waste your time honestly unless its on sale, or if youre only gonna play as a killer, or survive against friends.
(side note, if you do manage to wiggle out, youre injured and run ten times slower. ALSO, if you get on the hook Which you will if you are a survivor, the killer can just stand on top of you until you die... lmao. pointless.
